title: Knowledge-Centered Instructional Support and Service Innovation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Instructional Design Concepts
context.additional_context: Integration of collaborative tools and knowledge-sharing platforms among learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more teaching support processes using a knowledge management system
Learners can apply knowledge-sharing strategies for service innovation to actual educational scenarios
Learners can develop two or more knowledge-centered support designs tailored to learner needs in online environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
